attributes.title: Delete the app.
attributes.review: I don’t want trump to win because he is a racist and a homophobic orange. Like everyone in America knowsyou lied to win the election in 2016. And that not even all, he is so worried about the wall when he should be worry about finding a cure for the coronavirus.

attributes.title: Spam
attributes.review: I downloaded the app trying to get more educated but all it did was spam me with uneducated words and they all were coming from this orange man so to improve this app I would say get someone more educated please and thank you

attributes.title: scam
attributes.review: so when I downloaded this app I was told that I would get free tickets to another show on harry’s love on tour. unfortunately when I opened the app that was not what I saw. Instead it was disgusting homepage and with this clapped layout. don’t download it :)

attributes.title: Bad Allergic Reaction!
attributes.review: I downloaded the app and once opened,  I got a very bad allergic reaction.  My hand where I was hold the phone started shaking,  heart palpitations, anxiety, sweating, itchy watery eyes and nausea.  Also, my phone started acting up and crashing!  Don't recommend the app! 👁👄👁

attributes.title: Cheeto
attributes.review: I’m totally not part of the campaign of taking Cheeto’s app down. I love my beautiful very tanned small 🍤 President. My fingers are accidentally slipping a rating this app really low and writing a bad review. Oops 😬 😌💅 also some people should not have apps cause they are r a p * s t and r a c * s t ✨💅😘💕☺️

attributes.title: Take this app down!!!
attributes.review: this app took me 4hours to download and everyone obviously hates this app so take it down now!!!!🍆🤣😝😖💜🍓😍⛽️⛽️🚞🚤🚡🐀🐉🐂🦜🦒 really no one wants to see a human orange 🍊 on their screeen🤢🤮 and if you dare take down tiktok WE WILL take down your app! Period don’t think we won’t👁👅👁

attributes.title: Just not a great app
attributes.review: There’s no games. No where to do anything fun. It’s like the annoying ads that pop up when you’re playing game but it’s an app that’s goal is to sell you on Trump. Add games. I’ll still give you 0 stars

attributes.title: Terrible
attributes.review: I can’t believe what I saw when I opened this app absolutely unacceptable and the amount of ads I got when I opened this app is crazy and it kept glitching out on me what’s the point of this app if I can’t use it

attributes.title: Garbage
attributes.review: This app is literally trash. After downloading it all it did was glitch every time I opened it and my phone stopped working for at least an hour. Waste of time and space.
I was sooooo excited about this app🤩🥳, however when I opened it up😍, it immediately crashed😭😱😥... Eventually 😩it let me on🤠, but none of the features worked 😞🥺and it kept bugging out😤😳
